1153311.title: Shiki Ryougi

11533111.content: Why does she wear them?
11533111.title: Before the incident

1153311121.content: Shiki groaned as she slowly sat up in her bed, the crinkle of the padding that her other self, SHIKI, had put on before going to sleep muffled by the covers. Truthfully, unlike him she didn't particularly care for them. It wasn't that she especially disliked them, but rather she just felt nothing toward them. Any chance of others openly degrading either of them was effectively crushed by the reputation of the Ryougi family, and since it didn't really affect anyone, Shiki let him do as he pleased in that respect. With another groan, she stood up and stretched, before retrieving one of her many kimonos from her closet. Before putting on the nagajuban under-robe though, she paused to consider something: should she change to a more mature underwear, or stay padded. If she let SHIKI take over, he'd probably like it if she didn't change out of it.
1153311121.title: Preference of the Other Side

choices: Today's a school day, time to suffer through that drudgery
11533111211.content:
With a shrug, Shiki pulled on the nagajuban, followed by the rest of the pieces of her kimono, using a nearby mirror to tie the obi that held the kimono itself closed into a small bow behind her. While SHIKI might be a bit mischievous and sometimes do some questionable things with their shared body, it didn't hurt to throw him a bone every now and then. On top of that, Shiki would admit that it was comfortable, and because of how a kimono tends to be flowing, even closely inspecting herself in the mirror she couldn't even see the bulk around her waist. Nodding to herself, Shiki exited her room, noticing the crinkle with every step she took. Briefly, she wondered how SHIKI could put up with it, or if he simply either got used to it or tuned it out.

After a quick breakfast where either nobody noticed or felt like commenting on Shiki's padded state, it was time for her to head out.
11533111211.title: Let SHIKI have his way

Audrey then telling Mal that Fairy godmother had given some rules that she will need to follow for the punishment. Mal, despite not liking this whole situation to begin with decided to listen to what the rules were just to get it over with.

rule 1: Mal has to refer to her caregiver(Audrey) as "mommy" at all times during the punishment.

rule 2: during the punishment, the school bathrooms are off limits, the "baby" can only use the diapers, however the "baby" given the option to use a special training potty only when in the dorm room.

rule 3: Mal will not be allowed to change out of the diaper, dress, or bathe herself, only the caregiver will do that.

rule 4: during the punishment the cafeteria will have the option of the regular food or a special menu for babies(there could be more than just Mal in the punishment) but the caregiver can choose which to give the baby.

rule 5: if the "baby" becomes to much to handle(fighting, ect.) they will be physically regressed to make it easier.

rule 6: the "baby(s)" will be given strikes whenever a rule is broken, the punishment will be extended by another week after 3 strikes and so on.

rule 7: the caregiver is allowed to deliver punishments however they see fit if the "babies" misbehave.

135221211211.content:
today was laundry day at Auradon prep and Audrey was setting up one of the machines to start her laundry when something on the floor caught her attention, she realized that it was a pair of pink panties with her mother printed on them.
